AC.description: Document attached for certification by customs

AE.description: Document attached – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry (document returned to the trader)

AF.description: Document attached – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry (document returned to the relevant Department)

AG.description: Document attached – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry (document retained)

AP.description: Document attached – part use (applies to this and other entries) (document returned to the trader)

AS.description: Document attached – surrendered (document returned to the trader)

AT.description: Document attached – surrendered (document returned to the relevant department)

CP.description: Authorisation issued under the Union Custom Code with CCG - Part use (applies to this and other entries)

EA.description: Electronic details on Customs Handling of Import and Export Freight (CHIEF) – already attributed on simplified declaration

EL.description: Electronic details on CHIEF – ‘Late’ declaration after licence completed

EP.description: Electronic details on CHIEF – part use (applies to this and other entries)

FP.description: Facsimile attached – part use (applies to this and other entries)

GE.description: Document with the goods – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry

GP.description: Document with the goods – part use (applies to this and other entries)

HP.description: Facsimile with the goods – part use (applies to this and other entries)

IA.description: Details held by issuing authority – already attributed on simplified declaration

IE.description: Details held by issuing authority – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry

IP.description: Details held by issuing authority – part use (applies to this and other entries)

IS.description: Details held by issuing authority – surrendered

JA.description: Document held by authorised trader – already attributed on simplified declaration

JE.description: Document held by authorised trader – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry

JP.description: Evidence required is available from trader – part use (applies to this and other entries)

JS.description: Document held by authorised trader – surrendered

LE.description: Lodged previously – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry

LP.description: Lodged previously – part use (applies to this and other entries)

RE.description: To be used when declaration of a REX number is required

SP.description: Special authorisation for attached facsimile (paper held by trader) – part use (applies to this and other entries)

TP.description: Special authorisation for facsimile with the goods (paper held by trader) – part use (applies to this and other entries)

UA.description: Paper (held by trader) unavailable – already attributed on simplified declaration

UE.description: Paper (held by trader) unavailable – exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry

UP.description: Evidence required is unavailable – part use (applies to this and other entries)

XA.description: Electronic or paper document to be advised

XB.description: Document not required – quantity below ‘de minimus’

XF.description: Document not required – goods not going into free circulation

XO.description: To be used when declaration of a REX number isn’t required

XU.description: Unknown, specific document can’t be identified – security and/or undertaking may be required as detailed for the document or CPC

XX.description: Ex-heading goods for which the document doesn’t apply
